scripts.build:js: npx terser public/js/config.js public/js/state-manager.js public/js/api-client.js public/js/auth-client.js public/js/auth-helper.js public/js/auth-integration.js public/js/header-component.js public/js/mobile-navigation.js public/js/custom-modals.js public/js/error-handler.js public/js/logger.js public/js/performance-utils.js public/js/event-cleanup.js public/js/lazy-loader.js public/js/error-boundary.js -o public/js/bundle.min.js -c -m --source-map
scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run build:critical && echo '✅ Build complete!'
scripts.build:watch: nodemon --watch public/js --watch public/css -e js,css --exec 'npm run build'
scripts.stats: echo '📊 Bundle sizes:' && ls -lh public/js/bundle.min.js public/css/bundle.min.css 2>/dev/null || echo 'Run npm run build first'
scripts.build:core: npx terser public/js/config.js public/js/logger.js public/js/safe-html.js public/js/event-manager.js public/js/performance-utils.js public/js/error-boundary.js public/js/lazy-loader.js public/js/event-cleanup.js -o public/js/core.min.js -c -m --source-map
scripts.build:auth: npx terser public/js/auth-client.js public/js/auth-helper.js public/js/auth-integration.js -o public/js/auth.min.js -c -m --source-map
scripts.build:ui: npx terser public/js/mobile-navigation.js public/js/header-component.js public/js/admin-header.js public/js/custom-modals.js public/js/dashboard-fix.js -o public/js/ui.min.js -c -m --source-map
scripts.build:all-bundles: npm run build:core && npm run build:auth && npm run build:ui && npm run build:css && echo '✅ All bundles created!'
